item.title: 英伟达首席执行官在北京反垄断调查和人工智能限制期间访华
item.description: 本周，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）将踏上中国之行，访问各大城市，而此时中国政府正在调查该公司在国内的业务，华盛顿也在对其人工智能芯片的海外销售施加新的限制。【原文：Nvidia Corp. chief Jensen Huang is embarking on a trip to China this week, visiting major cities at a time Beijing is investigating his company’s domestic presence and Washington is slapping new curbs on the sale of its AI chips abroad.】

item.title: 特朗普关税报告令美元走软，铜价延续涨势
item.description: 铜价延续了今年的涨势，原因是有报道称即将上任的特朗普政府将缓慢提高贸易关税，而不是一次性征收巨额关税。【原文：Copper extended this year’s rally on a report the incoming Trump administration will slowly ramp up trade tariffs rather than impose sizable levies in one go.】

item.title: 台币将取代人民币成为亚洲第一大融资货币
item.description: 由于利率和货币波动风险较低，台币即将取代人民币成为亚洲最佳套利交易目标。【原文：The Taiwan dollar is on the verge of overtaking the yuan as Asia’s best carry-trade target given its lower risk of interest-rate and currency volatility.】

item.title: 据说阿波罗正在考虑天纳克印度公司以 20 亿美元的估值进行首次公开募股
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，阿波罗全球管理公司正在考虑将汽车零部件供应商天纳克公司（Tenneco Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is considering listing auto-parts supplier Tenneco Inc.’s India business, people familiar with the matter said, joining others that have done or plan initial public offerings of their units in the world’s most populous country.】

item.title: 制药公司在美国举行大型会议，因医疗成本问题招致抗议
item.description: 制药业最大的投资会议周一在旧金山吸引了抗议者，他们举着写有 "拖延、否认、取证 "字样的牌子，检察官说这些字写在上个月一名医疗保险公司高管遇害现场发现的弹壳上。【原文：The pharmaceutical industry’s biggest investment conference drew protesters in San Francisco Monday with signs reading “delay, deny, depose,” words prosecutors said were written on shell casings found at the scene of a health insurance executive’s killing last month.】

item.title: 分析师警告：印度的 "叙事股票 "还有很长的路要走
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 洛杉矶市政公用事业公司因帕利塞德大火缺水被起诉
item.description: 洛杉矶市的电力和供水公司遭到诉讼，指责其没有提供足够的水来扑灭这座美国第二大城市仍在肆虐的最大火灾。【原文：The city of Los Angeles’ electric and water utility was hit with a lawsuit faulting it for not supplying enough water to fight the biggest fire still raging in the second-largest US metropolis.】

item.title: 高盛认为加州野火对美国就业的拖累 "不大
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Deadly wildfires in Los Angeles County will likely result in only a “modest drag” on US jobs growth, even as the blazes shape as one of the costliest natural disasters in US history, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 印度股市大跌使主要指数逼近超卖水平
item.description: 在油价上涨和卢比疲软使印度股票指数跌至七个月低点后，印度股票基准正接近一些投资者认为的超卖水平。【原文：India’s equity benchmark is approaching a level seen as oversold by some investors after rising oil prices and a weak rupee sent the gauge to a seven-month low.】

item.title: 高盛称中国将推出广泛刺激政策以抵消关税影响
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：China will use a broad range of stimulus measures to offset the effects of expected US tariffs and a persisting housing downturn, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 中国天然气增长放缓，廉价选择挤压需求
item.description: 经济增长放缓和更廉价的替代品可能会削弱中国对天然气的需求。【原文：A slowing economy and cheaper alternatives are likely to take the edge off China’s appetite for natural gas.】

item.title: 日本央行副行长称若前景实现将上调利率
item.description: 日本央行副行长绯野良造重申，如果其前景继续得到实现，央行将提高利率，同时补充说，国内外都存在需要关注的风险。【原文：Bank of Japan Deputy Governor Ryozo Himino reiterated that the central bank will raise rates if its outlook continues to be realized, while adding that there are risks both at home and abroad that require attention.】

item.title: TikTok 被禁用的风险让用户急于下载另外两款中国制造的应用程序
item.description: 小红书和柠檬8这两款中国制造的社交应用占据了美国苹果公司iPhone下载排行榜的前两位，因为在TikTok即将被禁之前，用户正在寻找替代品。【原文：A pair of Chinese-made social apps, Xiaohongshu and Lemon8, have taken over the top two positions on Apple Inc.’s iPhone download charts in the US as users seek out alternatives to TikTok ahead of an imminent ban.】

item.title: 比特币跌跌不休，美联储政策前景削弱加密货币的特朗普交易
item.description: 受美联储进一步降息窗口即将关闭的猜测影响，比特币和更广泛的加密货币市场今年开局不稳。【原文：Bitcoin and the wider cryptocurrency market have made a shaky start to the year, hurt by speculation that the Federal Reserve’s window for further interest-rate cuts is closing.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长雷恩预计 2025 年年中利率将保持中性
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员奥利-雷恩预计，到 2025 年中期，欧元区利率将达到不再限制经济活动的水平。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Olli Rehn expects euro-zone interest rates to reach a level that no longer restricts economic activity by mid-2025.】

item.title: 在全球债券大跌之际，日本 40 年期收益率升至创纪录水平
item.description: 在全球债券大跌和日本央行未来可能加息的猜测声中，日本 40 年期国债收益率创下历史新高。【原文：Japan’s 40-year government bond yield reached an all-time high, amid a global bond selloff and speculation that the Bank of Japan may hike interest rates in the future.】

item.title: MMG、中金岭南旗下澳大利亚锌矿发生火灾
item.description: 澳大利亚两个大型锌矿因分别发生火灾而被迫暂时停产。【原文：Two large Australian zinc mines have been forced to temporarily halt production due to separate fire events.】

item.title: 美元因特朗普团队酝酿逐步加征关税的报道而下跌
item.description: 在彭博新闻社报道唐纳德-特朗普的新任经济团队正在考虑逐步提高关税之后，美元兑几乎所有主要货币都下跌了【原文：The dollar fell against almost every major currency after Bloomberg News reported that Donald Trump’s incoming economic team is considering gradual hikes in tariffs】

item.title: 中国讨论将美国 TikTok 出售给马斯克的可能方案之一
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国官员正在评估一个潜在的方案，如果 TikTok 无法抵御对该短视频应用的争议性禁令，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）将收购该公司在美国的业务。【原文：Chinese officials are evaluating a potential option that involves Elon Musk acquiring the US operations of TikTok if the company fails to fend off a controversial ban on the short-video app, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞银称美国滚动加征关税将给美联储带来 "问题
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS AG）的 Arend Kapteyn 认为，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普上台后逐步提高关税的决定将给美联储带来 "问题"，因为美联储正在与通胀的最后一公里作斗争。【原文：A decision by US President-elect Donald Trump to ramp up tariffs gradually once he takes office would be “problematic” for the Federal Reserve as it battles the last-mile of inflation, according to Arend Kapteyn at UBS AG.】

item.title: 加拿大大使警告将对美国关税采取 "以牙还牙 "的报复措施
item.description: 据加拿大驻华盛顿大使称，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税计划将导致加拿大 "以牙还牙 "的报复。【原文：US President-elect Donald Trump’s tariff plans will lead to “tit for tat” retaliation from Canada, according to the country’s ambassador in Washington.】

item.title: Citadel 希望通过债券销售筹集至少 5 亿美元资金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）创立的对冲基金管理公司 Citadel LP 正寻求通过出售公司债券筹集至少 5 亿美元资金。【原文：Citadel LP, the hedge fund manager founded by Ken Griffin, is looking to raise at least $500 million through a corporate bond sale, according to people with knowledge of the transaction.】

item.title: 澳大利亚消费者信心指数因前景黯淡而走低
item.description: 澳大利亚的消费者信心有所下降，原因是对更广泛经济的担忧，包括货币疲软和降息时间的不确定性。【原文：Australia’s consumer confidence edged down on concerns about the broader economy, including a weaker currency and uncertainty about the timing of interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 全球供应风险加剧，石油价格维持在五个月高位附近
item.description: 由于美国对俄罗斯实施更严厉的制裁以及即将上任的特朗普政府可能征收贸易关税，全球供应受到威胁，石油价格维持在五个月高点附近。【原文：Oil held near a five-month high on threats to global supplies posed by harsher US sanctions against Russian flows and potential trade tariffs from the incoming Trump administration.】

item.title: 印度 5,560 亿美元的股权之争随着经济增长降温而加剧
item.description: 投资者预计，由于经济增长放缓和持续的通货膨胀损害了企业盈利和外资流入，印度股市本季度将再次出现亏损。【原文：Investors are expecting Indian stocks to post another quarter of losses as a slowdown in economic growth and sticky inflation hurt corporate earnings and foreign flows.】

item.title: 智利在推进补贴法案时回避可再生能源利润掠夺问题
item.description: 智利下议院批准了一项扩大对低收入家庭电力补贴的法案，但取消了一项通过限制可再生能源行业利润来筹集部分所需资金的措施。【原文：Chile’s lower house approved a bill to expand electricity subsidies for lower-income families after stripping out a measure that would have raised part of the funds required by curbing profits in a segment of the renewable energy industry.】

item.title: 泰坦水泥美国分公司申请首次公开募股，披露利润增长情况
item.description: 泰坦美国公司（Titan America SA）是泰坦水泥国际公司（Titan Cement International SA）在美国的分公司，已在纽约申请首次公开募股，净收入增长了 18%。【原文：Titan America SA, the US unit of Titan Cement International SA, has filed for an initial public offering in New York, showing net income growth of 18%.】

item.title: 美联储降息希望渺茫，亚洲股市动荡不安：市场综述
item.description: 华尔街再次出现逢低买盘，推动部分股票反弹，扭转了因美联储重新调整押注而引发的大跌，亚洲股市看来将经历一段颠簸。【原文：Asian stocks look set for a bumpy ride after renewed dip buying on Wall Street fueled a rebound in some shares, reversing a selloff triggered by a recalibration of Federal Reserve wagers.】

item.title: 斯塔默希望在与伊拉克领导人的会谈中达成移民回返协议
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）希望在周二欢迎来自中东国家的伊拉克首相穆罕默德-希亚-苏达尼（Mohammed Shia Al-Sudani）来到唐宁街时，开始与伊拉克就移民回返协议进行谈判。【原文：UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer aims to start talks on a migrant returns agreement with Iraq when he welcomes his counterpart from the middle eastern nation, Mohammed Shia Al-Sudani, to Downing Street on Tuesday.】

item.title: 阿尔伯塔省警告征收石油关税，美加能源股走势分化
item.description: 阿尔伯塔省省长警告说，即将上任的特朗普政府很可能会对石油和天然气进口征收关税，在美国生产商反弹的情况下，加拿大石油和天然气股票仍创下了今年以来的最大跌幅。【原文：Canadian oil and gas stocks fell the most this year, even as US producers rallied, after Alberta’s premier warned that the incoming Trump administration is likely to put tariffs on oil and gas imports.】
